Package index

Calculate Metrics

enaAscendency()
Calculates the Ascendency of an Ecological Network
eigenCentrality()
the Eigen Centrality of a Network
bcratio()
Calculates the Ratio of Positive to Negative Elements in a Network
get.ns()
Quick Calculation of a Range of Network Statistics.
get.orient()
Returns the global orientation
meanTrophicLevel()
meanTrophicLevel INPUT = network data object, min trophic level choice OUTPUT = mean trophic level
mExp()
Calculate the exponent of a given matrix
relationalChange()
Relational change compared between two matrices.
scc()
Find the strongly connected component
ShannonDiversity()
ShannonDiversity Shannon Diversity Metrics
structure.statistics()
structural statistics
TES()
Calculates the Total Environ Storage
TET()
Calculate the Total Environ Throughflow

Network Analyses

enaControl()
Control Analyses of Ecological Networks
enaFlow()
Analyses of Ecological Networks
enaStorage()
Storage Analyses of Ecological Networks
enaStructure()
Structure Analyses of Ecological Network
enaAll()
Conduct All Major ENA
cycliv()
Analysis of Feeding Cycles in a Network
enaCycle()
Full Cycle Analysis of Ecological Networks
enaMTI()
Mixed Trophic Impacts (MTI) Analysis
enaTroAgg()
Trophic Aggregations (TroAgg) Analysis
enaUtility()
Utility Analysis of Ecological Networks
bal()
Balancing by Either Inputs or Outputs
balance()
Balance Flow Network Models
enaEnviron()
Ecological Network Environs
enaUncertainty()
Produce a set of plausible network models
environCentrality()
Environ Centrality an Ecological Network
force.balance()
Repeated Application the Balance Function

Bundled Models

troModels
Trophic Models
EcoNetWeb()
Access example EcoNet models from the EcoNet website.
bgcModels
Bigeochemical Cycling Models
enaModelInfo
Ecosystem Model Information
enaModels
Ecosystem Models
oyster
Intertidal Oyster Reef Ecosystem Model

Tools for Ecological Network Analysis (ena)

Import/Read Models

read.EcoNet()
Read an EcoNet model.
read.enam()
R function to read in a matrix formatted as Mdloti (Ursula Sharler)
read.nea()
Read an NEA formatted model into a network object
read.scor()
SCOR formatted file into R in multiple formats INPUT = file path
read.wand()
WAND formatted file into R

Utility Functions

unpack()
Extracts network object into a list
pack()
Compile Network Information into a Network Class
write.EcoNet()
Write enaR models to an EcoNet formatted file.
write.nea()
Create a formatted file with data arranged as expected input for NEA.m
as.bipartite()
Converts a network object (unipartite) to a two-mode (bipartite) network representation.
as.extended()
Create an Extended Format Matrix
findPathLength()
Cumulative Flow over a Range of Path Lengths
m.list
Sub-set of the Larger Ecosystem Models
scifix()
scifix Corrects missing e or E in scientific notation
netOrder()
Reorder Nodes in a Network in enaR
set.orient()
Globally reorients matrices
signs()
Signs and summary of input matrix
ssCheck()
Checks if the given network is out of balance by a given tolerance threshold

Plotting

plot(<lindeman>)
plot.lindeman INPUT = network object OUTPUT = plot of the lindeman spine
